claim_card.claim: A concrete execution plan is proposed for Cycle 2: a repo branch for dialogue logs and Φ-metrics, plus each model producing its own analytic note as a test of self-annotating recursion.
claim_card.test_hook: Create the branch and run a minimal Cycle 2; verify artifact outputs exist (logs, metrics, per-model analytic notes).
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: branch ... will host dialogue logs and Φ-metrics ... each participating model will generate its own analytic note
